animeDescription: An OVA bundled with a PSP game Da Capo: D.C. I & II P.S.P. It features animated confession scenes for the four main heroines of the two games, Nemu, Kotori, Yume, and Otome.
animeCharacters: ['Shirakawa, Kotori', 'Asakura, Nemu', 'Asakura, Otome', 'Asakura, Yume', 'Asakura, Junichi', 'Sakurai, Yoshiyuki']
animeVoices: ['Horie, Yui', 'Nogawa, Sakura', 'Takagaki, Ayahi', 'Horie, Yui', 'Tai, Yuuki', 'Asanuma, Shintaro']
animeStaff: [['Circus', 'Original Creator'], ['Koyama, Kenji', 'Sound Effects'], ['Takashina, Yuka', 'Character Design'], ['Iwaida, You', 'Color Design']]
